name: Cursed Ruins
description: A place of ancient evil that was destroyed but still radiates malevolent energy, creating a dangerous and unpredictable environment. The dark magic and potential powerful artifacts attract evil spellcasters, while the cursed nature creates constant supernatural danger.
atmosphere: Malevolent energy pulses through broken stones like dark heartbeat. Air crackles with dark magic, ancient evil, and powerful artifacts scent. Skin crawls with presence of cursed energy and supernatural danger. Taste of malevolent power and ancient evil fills mouth. Weight of dark magic and constant supernatural danger presses down like physical force.
